refnamediv.refpurpose: Extra types for use when calling UPnP actions.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: #define GUPNP_TYPE_BIN_BASE64 #define GUPNP_TYPE_BIN_HEX #define GUPNP_TYPE_DATE #define GUPNP_TYPE_DATE_TIME #define GUPNP_TYPE_DATE_TIME_TZ #define GUPNP_TYPE_TIME #define GUPNP_TYPE_TIME_TZ #define GUPNP_TYPE_URI #define GUPNP_TYPE_UUID

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These GTypes are used to marshal to and from string data to particular UPnP types when invoking actions on a GUPnPServiceProxy.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_BIN_BASE64
refsect2.para: A string type containing Base-64 encoded binary data.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_BIN_HEX
refsect2.para: A string type containing binary hexadecimal encoded binary data.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_DATE
refsect2.para: A string type representing a date in ISO 8601 format with no time or timezone.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_DATE_TIME
refsect2.para: A string type representing a date in ISO 8601 format with optional time but no timezone.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_DATE_TIME_TZ
refsect2.para: A string type representing a date in ISO 8601 format with optional time and timezone.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_TIME
refsect2.para: A string type representing a time in ISO 8601 format with no date or timezone.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_TIME_TZ
refsect2.para: A string type representing a time in ISO 8601 format with optional timezone and no date.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_URI
refsect2.para: A string type representing a Universal Resource Indentifier.

refsect2.title: GUPNP_TYPE_UUID
refsect2.para: A Universally Unique ID represented as a hexadecimal-encoded string.
